backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing users, authentication, appointments, patients, leads, and storage with initialization helpers and registration logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user data to a new format by adding leadStatus to each lead and returning updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping specific feature requests to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of concise summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/GO_LIVE.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and step-by-step instructions for deploying the app to Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up metadata, icons, root container, and service worker registration for the frontend app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, display mode, and metadata for installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that caches static assets, cleans old caches, and serves cached or network responses based on request type.
frontend/QA_APPOINTMENTS_ID_REGRESSION_T: QA test plan validating appointment edit/delete correctness using stable appointment IDs across scenarios.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, tab navigation, and global providers for queries and notifications.
UI card showing appointment details with actions for calling, messaging, editing, deleting, adding to patients, and sending follow‑up.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentDialo: Dialog for creating or editing appointments, including contact import, form handling, and submit logic.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentFeedb: Component providing WhatsApp feedback request actions with validation and preview dialog.
Empty file placeholder for a flyer dialog component.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar allowing users to switch between the main app tabs.
frontend/src/components/ContactImportRev: Dialog for reviewing and confirming imported contact name and mobile before use.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpDateTime: Dialog for selecting a date and 12-hour time, converting it to a bigint timestamp, and returning it via onConfirm.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing clinic info, sync status, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LeadCard.tsx: Displays lead details with actions for calling, WhatsApp, editing, deleting, and updating lead status.
frontend/src/components/LeadDialog.tsx: Form dialog for creating or editing leads, including date fields, contact import, and optional appointment creation.
frontend/src/components/PatientCard.tsx: Card showing patient info with actions for calling, WhatsApp, editing, deleting, and creating appointments.
frontend/src/components/PatientDialog.ts: Dialog for adding or editing patients, supporting contact import, camera photo capture, and image upload.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog component for collecting and saving a user's name and clinic name with form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFeedback: Dialog showing a WhatsApp feedback message preview and destination number before confirming send.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAwareSync.t: Hook that polls backend modification timestamps and invalidates relevant React Query caches when data changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactPicker.ts: Hook providing a contact picker with detailed error handling for unsupported devices and permission issues.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and exposing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLastSync.ts: Hook tracking the last successful data sync time and formatting it into human‑readable text.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hook scheduling appointment reminders via browser notifications or alerts with permission handling and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as timestamps, user profiles, appointments, patients, and leads.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks whether any key data queries are currently fetching and returns a boolean sync status.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode theme, scrollbars, and global transitions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for merging class names and formatting dates and timestamps into 12-hour strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsTab.tsx: Displays and manages leads, including listing, sorting, searching, and opening dialogs for add/edit operations.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login UI and triggers Internet Identity authentication with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PatientsTab.tsx: Shows a searchable list of patients and provides dialogs for adding or editing patient records.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleTab.tsx: Displays today's, tomorrow's, and upcoming appointments with edit and follow‑up scheduling functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsTab.tsx: Settings UI enabling clinic name editing, data export, PWA install prompt, and manual sync by invalidating queries and updating sync time.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Appointment, Patient, and Lead entities.
frontend/src/utils/phone.ts: Provides a utility to normalize phone numbers by removing whitespace.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappFeedback.ts: Generates WhatsApp feedback messages and URLs, including mobile validation and opening WhatsApp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing features, pending requests, issues, and architecture notes for syncing and UI updates.
